message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $12,000. It's a fantastic deal!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $12,000 is too high for me. Would you consider $6,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents a fair price, I'm willing to come down to $10,000. I believe this product will be a valuable asset for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you coming down on price, but $10,000 is still a bit too high for my budget. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $8,000?
